subject: Automobile Racing
lead_paragraph: Robert Kubica grabbed his first Formula One victory and the series points lead after Lewis Hamilton’s mistake took him and the world champion Kimi Raikkonen out of the Canadian Grand Prix in Montreal. Hamilton, the defending champion and pole-sitter, slammed his Mercedes McLaren into the rear of Raikkonen’s Ferrari in the pits early in the race, taking out both and giving the 23-year-old Kubica a clear road to victory in his 29th Formula One start.
